prompts: Create a ghost-type Pokemon that haunts the night with eerie whispers and floating abilities.
Imagine a spooky creature that can manipulate shadows and has a haunting presence.
Design an intimidating Pokemon with a menacing grin and a dark color palette.
Show me a Pokemon that can travel through dimensions and has a skeletal appearance.
Generate a Pokemon with a mysterious aura, known to guard ancient secrets and treasures.
Make a ghostly figure with glowing eyes and a body that resembles a shadowy cloak.
Give me a dark-type Pokemon that thrives in abandoned places and has a playful yet eerie personality.

distinctive_features: Large hands with a ghostly aura
